column1: Uchi////Tips: Make a reservation when you can -- a wait for 2 people can get as long as 1.5 hours
column2: but I promise you it's worth it if you can just hold off a little. Also
column3: sit at the sushi bar when you get the opportunity. The service is amazing
column4: and you get your own little "entertainment" with the chefs. Last time a friend and I went
column5: we got carried away in a fun convo with the chefs (ask for Huy - he's hilarious!)
column6: and at the end of our dinner
column7: they treated us to a dessert on the house. So sweet!!
